''b. {{FA|365|n}}''}} {{familytree/end}} == Other versions of the legendarium == The name ''Saelon'' is an emendation from an earlier name ''Sael..th'' (which wasn't completely legible). [[Christopher Tolkien]] speculates that in this characters are seen the roots of a story which would eventually become ''[[Athrabeth Finrod ah Andreth]]'' - especially since ''Saelon'' was an earlier name of [[Andreth]] in the drafts of that story. {{references}} {{title}} [[Category:Edain]] [[Category:First Age characters]] [[Category:House of Hador]]
